title: The Tide of traffic
creator_credit: Derek Williams, Humphrey Swingler, British Petroleum and Greenpark Productions
brief_description: Takes a world-wide look at our growing dependence on cars and road transport, and at the environmental impact of the congested motorways This film was BP’s contribution to the 1972 Stockholm United Nations Conference on the Human Environment.
creator_credit_for_label: Derek Williams, Humphrey Swingler, British Petroleum and Greenpark Productions
